overview:
Phyllis Orenstein Bresler founded PW Communications in 1996 to fill a void in personnel outsourcing for professional proposal support. PW Communications assists government contractors and commercial entities in developing winning proposals in response to formal Requests for Proposals. The company has been selected for the Inc. 500/5000 list of fastest-growing privately-held companies in the United States,

Ms. Bresler has over 25 years of experience managing and writing proposals for a variety of government agencies. Her company’s client bid on a wide range of RFPs for government agencies, such as Departments of Defense, Justice and Homeland Security. She has worked on some of the largest RFPs ever released for bid. Ms. Bresler is a graduate of the University of Pennsylvania. She is a guest lecturer at Georgetown University’s McDonough School of Business and is on the Advisory Board for Monument Bank, Bethesda, MD. She can be reached at pbresler@pwcommunications.com.
